name: Arcane Supremacy
description:
Release Date: 05/05/21           Platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows)

Short Description:

A first-person shooter with magical elements. Navigate through uniquely themed level arenas that require magical artefacts to traverse them.

Context:

You're a magician that travels between magical realms defeating elemental creatures that you find along your way to the portals off-world.

Arcane Supremacy's unique elemental mechanics encourages counterplay and quick thinking.

Key Features:

  • Swapping between four types of elemental ammunition 
  • Acquiring special ability relics
  • Unique levels in varying environments
  • Intense arena combat against enemies entering in waves
